price: 72. Dis : « Il est possible qu’une partie de ce que vous êtes pressés (de voir arriver) soit imminente. »
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
